body:
Hi All, 



I keep on having the error ' 'SkyType' is not defined' when using the SkyDome component (see screenshot attached). I use a epw weather file from energy plus.net. Can someone help me?



Thanks, 



Victor

replies.body: You're missing one component in the process. SkyDome needs a selectedSkyMtx and not cumulative sky. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/QXFoMJO9hw7dYe1DQUTI*VCIVjirXUVMh-czrty0FibOWglw2K7Q10IasYDikLBahzG6MlR3doz0vF-58wd-WWQejDDBNKch/selectedSkyMtx.png)
